name: salahtimes
description: A tiny library to get the islamic prayer times in utc for any given day and location.

scripts.build-docs: npm run clean-docs && npm run generate-docs
scripts.generate-docs: typedoc --listInvalidSymbolLinks --includeDeclarations --mode file --out docs --readme none --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --ignoreCompilerErrors --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown

author: Edonis Seferi
